text: Donald William "Don" Bayley was a weightlifter from Australia. Donald competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born on 9 October 1931 and died on 5 May 1983.Donald Bayley == References == Category:1931 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Australian weightlifters Category:Olympians for Australia Category:Sportspeople from Queensland
title: Donald Bayley
